content: MP-PS Beam fixpoint connector Beam connectors for attaching MP-PS pipe shoes to steel beams ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Simpler installation – easy-to-adjust and retrofit method for mounting pipe shoes to steel beams Safer jobsites – clamping function to avoid welding and drilling Part of the MP pipe shoe system – an adjustable solution for virtually any relevant steel beam width Slim design – allows better access whenever insulation for hot piping needs to be wrapped around pipe shoe Suitable for stand-up, suspended and horizontal or vertical mounting against I-beam columns Applications Fastening MP-PS pipe shoes used as fixpoint to steel beams Recommended for use in Indoor or Outdoor with low to moderate pollution (C3) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Fire resistance ( Yes/No): No Temperature resistance: -4 - 572 °F Material composition: Beam Clamps (Clamping Claw + Saddle): Cast Iron per DIN EN1562, Baseplate: S280GD per EN10346, Rectangular washer: S235JR – Yield280 per HN 707, Bolts: F Class 8.8 per ISO 898-1, Nuts: Grade 8 per ISO 898-2, Retaining Washer: C60E per EN10132-3, Cylindrical washers: Stainless Steel X5CrNi18-10 per EN10088-3 Technical Data | Fire resistance ( Yes/No) | No | Temperature resistance | -4 - 572 °F | Material composition | Beam Clamps (Clamping Claw + Saddle): Cast Iron per DIN EN1562, Baseplate: S280GD per EN10346, Rectangular washer: S235JR – Yield280 per HN 707, Bolts: F Class 8.8 per ISO 898-1, Nuts: Grade 8 per ISO 898-2, Retaining Washer: C60E per EN10132-3, Cylindrical washers: Stainless Steel X5CrNi18-10 per EN10088-3 | Material thickness | All sheet metal parts: 5mm | Surface finish | Beam clamps and rectangular washer: DIN EN ISO 1461, baseplate: ZM300, bolts/nuts: ISO 10684, Retaining washers: ISO 10683, Cylindrical washer: Stainless Steel | Hot-dip galvanized | Yes | Environmental conditions | Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) | Base material type | Modular Support | Wrench size | 19 mm | Steel beam thickness | 3 - 36 mm | Steel beam thickness min. | 3 mm | Steel beam thickness min. (conversion inch fractional) | 1/8 in | Steel beam thickness max. | 36 mm | Steel beam thickness max. (conversion inch fractional) | 1-7/16 in ### ITEMS- 2331072 - Pipe Shoe Beam Connector MP-PS IFG 80/160 OC - Package Size 4 pc - 2331073 - Pipe Shoe Beam Connector MP-PS IFG 160/230 OC - Package Size 4 pc - 2331074 - Pipe Shoe Beam Connector MP-PS IFG 230/300 OC - Package Size 4 pc
